glosses: to overlook, to excuse, to tolerate, to condone, to turn a blind eye

examples.text: Senin durmayan bu abuk sabuk davranışlarına artık göz yumamayacağım.
examples.translation: I can't overlook your constant stupid nonsensical behavior anymore.

etymology: From göz (“eye”) + yummak (“to shut, to clench”), literally “to shut one's eye”.
